analytic.title: The Arabic Commentary of Abu Zakariya Yaḥya (Judah ben Samuel) ibn Bal‘am on the Twelve Minor Prophets

biblStruct.note: On ibn Bal‘am’s commentary on the Minor Prophets. In his footnotes to the edited text of Ibn Balʿam’s commentary Poznański sporadically cites the anonymous reworking of Yefet b. Eli’s Judaeo-Arabic translation of the Latter Prophets in Ms. Hunt. 206 of the Bodleian Library (per those portions edited by Heisz {https://www.zotero.org/groups/biblia_arabica/items/itemKey/JR39UDLB}, Klein {https://www.zotero.org/groups/538215/biblia_arabica/items/itemKey/TP5YI7J7/q/klein}, Friedmann {https://www.zotero.org/groups/538215/biblia_arabica/items/itemKey/IGJ5MT8M/q/friedmann}, and Schröter {https://www.zotero.org/groups/538215/biblia_arabica/items/itemKey/2EEXHZ9V/q/schröter}{https://www.zotero.org/groups/538215/biblia_arabica/items/itemKey/DVM2SEFS/q/schröter}). On the later identification of this Ms. with Yefet’s work see, inter alios, P. Birnbaum’s 1942 edition of Yefet on Hosea {https://www.zotero.org/groups/538215/biblia_arabica/items/itemKey/34RLRYC5/q/birnbaum} and E. Schlossberg’s 2000 Pe‘amim article {https://www.zotero.org/groups/538215/biblia_arabica/items/itemKey/NY3EPQ72/q/schlossberg}.
